issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] TableProvider.scan executing partitions prematurely
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9734](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9734). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
TableProvider.scan was immediately executing all partitions in parallel instead of just returning the partitions and letting the caller execute them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9734?focusedCommentId=17177486) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7962
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7962>
